__e: Guess they already decided that Chester did it.
Hey,listen,um,I was talking to chester, and apparentlyhe hasn't been fed this morning.
Yeah, and Chester's been mad at me because of it ever since.
I thought coming back to Chester's Mill would be good for you, for us, but I can see now that it's just upsetting you.
Well, I would say Chester's Mill is in more than a crisis, so... you and I need to get to work.
Those are not the words of comfort, not to the nation or the world, certainly not to the people of Chester's Mill, who appear to be trapped.
